landing.bio: I am an electrical engineer with 2+ years of experience as an R&D engineer in the field of machine learning and control system design at the Institute for Computer Science and Control. I also have expertise in programming of embedded systems, autonomous robots & vehicles, and computer vision. My Bachelor thesis is focused on the 'Design of Control Stability Program for Vehicles' using soft computing techniques in MATLAB (genetic algorithm (GA), particle swarm optimization (PSO), fuzzy logic controller and adaptive neuro-fuzzy systems (ANFIS)). My Master thesis is about 'Self-Driving Car with Deep Reinforcement Learning'.

experience.organization: SZTAKI - Institute for Computer Science and Control
experience.aboutWork: Estimation of the flexible states and dynamics of the wings of an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) utilizing model-based and machine learning-based techniques. The model-based approach uses extended Kalman-filtering. The machine learning-based approaches use recurrent neural networks (RNN) and convolutional neural networks (CNN). This research is part of the FLiPASED H2020 EU-funded project. Two conference articles are published discussing the results.

experience.organization: SZTAKI - Institute for Computer Science and Control
experience.aboutWork: Reconfiguration and expansion of the IMU sensor system of an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) as a part of the FLiPASED H2020 EU-funded project. The sensors are located on the wings of the aircraft and are used for monitoring aeroelastic flutter. The IMU sensors use PIC microcontrollers that are connected to the ST microcontroller of the FCC. Data transmission is done via CAN bus.

interests.paragraphOne: Despite being an electrical engineering student, one of my main area of interests is automobiles (especially from the 1980s to the mid 2000s). Because of this, I often spend time reading about the latest advancements of the automotive industry and the history and details of specific car models.
interests.paragraphTwo: In my free-time I regularly do workout. I enjoy listening to classical and rock music and play my acoustic guitar. I am also quite fond of movies and serials.
